altTitles.uk: Я більше не закохана у вас

altTitles.ja: もうこれ以上愛さない

description.en:
To Neveah, the world seemed like an eternal winter. Her parents and maids had given her the cold shoulder ever since she was a baby. When she fell down in the snow, no one spared her a glance. It was truly a dreadful winter.

While living day to day like a doll on a display shelf, Neveah was engaged as part of a pre-natal agreement between her father and her fiancé’s father. Her fiancé was a Wistash. Duke Valor Wistash.

As in the prelude to every tragedy, it all began with a damned love.

"Love has its moments. You missed them all, and now I don't love you anymore," Neveah said to her fiancé who had never once looked at her for the past decade, then left the Empire for the neighboring country where she was welcomed with open arms.

She didn't expect anything there and was simply planning to live quietly, but the Emperor's attitude towards her was exceedingly friendly.

"I want you to be happy. You can wish for anything and do as you please. I want to give you a season where you don't have to be constantly wary of other people."

After meeting Arendt, Neveah's winter began to overflow… into spring as the snow began to melt.

---
Ever since she was little, Neveah has felt lonely. Since birth, she has been engaged to a man she is in love with. Unfortunately, her fiancé ignored her for ten years.

Finally, she decides to break her engagement and change her life. Her solution? Asking the Emperor's hand in marriage! For this, she will have to respect several conditions, the first one: never falling in love with him.

---

description.fr:
Depuis toute petite, elle est malmenée par son entourage. Une fois adulte,elle est mariée de force à un homme odieux qui lui fera vivre un calvaire pendant 10 ans! Sa solution pour s’en sortir? Demander l’empereur en mariage! Pour cela, il va falloir remplir plusieurs conditions, à commencer par ne surtout pas tomber amoureuse de lui...

---

description.ru:
Мир для Нивеи всегда был холодным. Люди смотрели на неё с презрением из-за того, что она была горничной, а родители не обращали внимания. Казалось, будто она оказалась в холодном и заснеженном мире, где до неё не было дела никому.

---

description.uk:
Ще змалечку Невея відчувала себе самотньо. З народження вона заручена з чоловіком, якого кохала. На жаль, наречений ігноруватиме її протягом десяти років.
Нарешті вона вирішила розірвати заручини та змінити своє життя. Її рішення? Просити імператора про одруження! Для цього вона слідуватиме трьом умовам, перша, ніколи не закохуватися у нього.

---
